titleStmt.title: Londons doue: or A memoriall of the life and death of Maister Robert Doue, citizen and marchant-taylor of London and of his seuerall almesdeeds and large bountie to the poore, in his life time. He departed this life, on Saterday the 2. day of this instant moneth of May, 1612.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

titleStmt.title: Londons doue: or A memoriall of the life and death of Maister Robert Doue, citizen and marchant-taylor of London and of his seuerall almesdeeds and large bountie to the poore, in his life time. He departed this life, on Saterday the 2. day of this instant moneth of May, 1612.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, for Ioseph Hunt, and are to be solde at his house in Bedlam, neere Moore-field Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
